remarks: Re-index an extended sum using a bijection.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Apr-2017.)
statement:
esumf1o.0 $e |- F/ n ph $.
esumf1o.a $e |- F/_ n A $.
esumf1o.c $e |- F/_ n C $.
esumf1o.f $e |- F/_ n F $.
esumf1o.1 $e |- ( k = G -> B = D ) $.
esumf1o.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
esumf1o.3 $e |- ( ph -> F : C -1-1-onto-> A ) $.
esumf1o.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ n e. C ) -> ( F ` n ) = G ) $.
esumf1o.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) $.
esumf1o $p |- ( ph -> sum* k e. A B = sum* n e. C D ) $.
$d A k $.
$d B n $.
$d C k $.
$d D k $.
$d G k $.
$d k n $.
$d k ph $.
